local_intent: Perceive t_block, align and set yaw 90, execute one 0.1 push at 90 deg, then verify visibility.
assumptions: Block is reachable on a planar surface
Yaw 90 aligns push direction with task plan
coherence_with_global: Replicates global perception fallback, alignment, yaw enforcement, and a single push from the repeated push phase; concludes with a simple visibility check.
